title: Alli Simpson puts on a leggy display in collared dress at Moet & Chandon Spring Champion Stakes Day
text:
She's the Australian singer with a thriving career as a social media star.

And on Saturday, Alli Simpson turned heads as she stepped out at Moet & Chandon Spring Champion Stakes Day in Sydney.

The 21-year-old was a vision in a white collared Zimmermann dress which featured an open shirt with a floral pattern display.

Alli Simpson puts on a leggy display in white collared Zimmermann dress at Moet & Chandon Spring Champion Stakes Day

Alli rounded out her look with a pair of metallic gold stilettos, and wore her blonde lob in an updo with a white headpiece.

The blonde stunner showed off her natural complexion, wearing little makeup consisting of light foundation and lipstick.

She completed her look with a pink handbag and golden crucifix earrings.

Stand out: Alli rounded out her look with a pair of metallic gold stilettos, and wore her blonde lob in an updo with a white headpiece

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia, the beauty influencer revealed that she's considering heading back to Los Angeles after temporarily moving to Sydney.

She confessed: 'I've been in Sydney for about a year near now..I'm thinking about thinking about going to Los Angeles next year.'

The YouTube star also confessed that things are getting quite serious with her actor boyfriend of six months, Mitchell Bourke, as they contemplate moving in together.

LA bound: Speaking to Daily Mail Australia, the beauty influencer revealed that she's considering heading back to Los Angeles after temporarily moving to Sydney

Speaking about her blossoming romance, she said: 'It's been almost six months, and very much in love. We wouldn't trade it for the world.'

Since moving to Sydney, the blonde beauty found success hosting a series of different fashion functions and even having starred on SBS TV series Filthy Rich and Homeless.

Alli, the younger sister of singer Cody Simpson, revealed she's also spent the last few months writing new music, and is hoping to collaborate with her DJ friends.
description: She's the Australian singer with a thriving career as a social media star.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
